page_content: The page discusses the digital transformation within the cantonal administration of Zurich, emphasizing the need for increased networking and collaboration.
The page details the financing and reporting procedures related to the integration of asylum seekers, temporarily admitted persons, and refugees in the Canton of Zurich.
The page provides a downloadable PDF titled "Erosionssch채tzschl체ssel f체r den Kanton Z체rich - Bodenerosion im Ackerbau: Massnahmen gezielt planen," authored by Alexander Lehmann.
The page focuses on noise control during planning and construction, emphasizing societal responsibility and the importance of proper noise protection.
The page provides information on how municipalities in the Canton of Zurich can apply for the reimbursement of "Versorgertaxen" (care taxes) for child and youth home care services.
The page is not accessible, and a 404 error is displayed.
The page titled "Vorsicht blinde Passagiere" discusses the issue of invasive aquatic species in the Canton of Zurich.

The page titled "Aktuelle Spitalplanung" provides information on hospital planning in the Canton of Zurich, including details on acute care, psychiatry, rehabilitation, and specific requirements for hospitals.
The page details a government resolution regarding the extension of the usage rights for the software "Agricola" until the end of 2025.
